subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Alberto Salazar, the former champion marathoner, who collapsed over the weekend, had his condition upgraded yesterday to fair from serious. A cardiologist at Providence St. Vincent Medical Center said Salazar had a heart attack while coaching distance runners Saturday at the Nike campus outside Portland, Ore., a hospital spokeswoman said.
